vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 3 to the professional services contract with The Kercher Group, Inc. to develop and provide the configuration and maintenance of the pavement model to be used for the City’s annual maintenance plan and future bond programming for street repairs as well as continue the development of alley programming and modeling - Not to exceed $452,540.00, from $621,911.53 to $1,074,451.53 - Financing: General Fund
vote.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 3 to the professional services contract with The Kercher Group, Inc. to develop and provide the configuration and maintenance of the pavement model to be used for the City’s annual maintenance plan and future bond programming for street repairs as well as continue the development of alley programming and modeling - Not to exceed $452,540.00, from $621,911.53 to $1,074,451.53 - Financing: General Fund
